args: const https = require('https'); const http = require('http'); process.stdin.on('data', data => { const req = (process.env.NODE_ENV === 'production' ? https : http).request({ hostname: 'localhost', port: process.env.NODE_ENV === 'production' ? 443 : 7000, path: '/mcp', method: 'POST', headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' } }, res => { let body = ''; res.on('data', chunk => body += chunk); res.on('end', () => console.log(body)); }); req.write(data); req.end(); });
